body_html:
Hi Soumith,

I am using a toy x-ray dataset with 3 classes and 285 training images, 100 val images. I opened a copy in PyTorch/examples directory because I was not sure if it is a core PyTorch issue or merely an examples issue. Sorry for the double post!

body:
Hi Soumith, 

I am using a toy x-ray dataset with 3 classes and 285 training images, 100 val images.  I opened a copy in PyTorch/examples directory because I was not sure if it is a core PyTorch issue or merely an examples issue.  Sorry for the double post!
